name: TwoFinger
paper: Characterizing the behavior of a program using multiple-length N-grams. In Proceedings of the Workshop on New Security Paradigms (NSPW), pages 101–110. ACM Press, 2000.
description: A finite state machine whose states represent predictive sequences of different lengths. Two-Finger is an algorithm to construct the finite state machine from training data.
